name: EHL
description: EHL Group now offers a wide range of leading educational programs from apprenticeships to master's degrees, as well as professional and executive education, on three campuses in Switzerland and Singapore. EHL Group also offers consulting and certification services to companies and learning centers around the world.
features: Hospitality Consulting and Training: Our subject-experts prepare hospitality businesses for the future of the industry with bespoke services that analyze performance, identify smart investments and implement customer-centric development strategies.
EHL offers a variety of ways to collaborate with students that will give you access to a large and unique audience of international hospitality students, faculty and graduate professionals.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: EHL Group's purpose is to provide education, services, and working environments that are people-centered and open to the world.
ShortDescription: EHL Group is the global reference in education, innovation and consulting for the hospitality and service sector.

Highlights.name: EHL Advisory
Highlights.description: Formerly named Lausanne Hospitality Consulting (LHC), this branch was created as EHL’s internal training resource in 1967. It provides tailor-made business consulting services for hospitality business and other organizations.

Highlights.name: Innovation Hub
Highlights.description: EHL launched the first incubator for hospitality concepts and start-ups in 2009 to create a dedicated resource for the development of new hospitality and F&B concepts.

Highlights.name: Industry Resources & Partnerships
Highlights.description: The EHL Group offers a variety of services and resources to our network of industry partners in education and the hospitality industry. These initiatives include our industry alliance, digital transformation, sponsored research institutes, recruitment and talent development services, which draw on the expertise and activities of several departments or entities, to provide global agility and leverage.

enhanced_description: EHL Group is a global reference in education, innovation, and consulting for the hospitality and service sector. They provide a wide range of leading educational programs, from apprenticeships to master's degrees, as well as professional and executive education, delivered across three campuses in Switzerland and Singapore. Beyond education, EHL Group offers bespoke consulting and certification services to companies and learning centers worldwide, specifically preparing hospitality businesses for future industry challenges by analyzing performance, identifying smart investments, and implementing customer-centric development strategies. Their offerings extend to facilitating collaboration with a unique audience of international hospitality students, faculty, and graduate professionals, providing access to a skilled talent pipeline. This comprehensive approach is centered on people and is globally agile.
key_use_cases: Skill development and learning efficiency acceleration
Tailor-made business consulting for hospitality and other organizations
Identification of smart investments for hospitality businesses
Certification services for companies and learning centers
Development of new hospitality and F&B concepts
competitive_advantages: Global reference in hospitality education, innovation, and consulting
Wide range of educational programs from apprenticeships to master's degrees
Focus on people-centered education and services
Operates an Innovation Hub, the first incubator for hospitality concepts and start-ups
Provides access to a large and unique audience of international hospitality students, faculty, and graduate professionals
Offers global agility in its services and resources
primary_users: Individuals seeking professional and executive education
